fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Appear as a random role from a ref that spawned this night. (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- 20% chance to die at the start of day 3, 90% chance to die on day 4 if you didn't use your ability yet.
- You die if you are converted or your role is modified.
- Roleblocks silence you the next day.
- On death, you die again, you also get attacked by a random serial killer role on each death.
- Roll a d20 everytime you vote or change your vote, on a 1, you die instantly, on a 20, you gain one extra ammo for your ability.
- Anyone with blue in their profile picture have their negative abilties process instantly on you.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Survive to see the town win with less than 4 townie deaths, you cannot win if the game ends on a friday.
